Class CrosshairHUD

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.renderables.HUD
      • fast3d.renderables.CrosshairHUD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable

    public class CrosshairHUD
extends HUD
    a simple crosshair in the middle of the screen
    Author:
    Tim Trense

        public CrosshairHUD(int sizePX,
                    Color color)
        constructs a new crosshair with the stroke-length of sizePX and the given color
        Parameters:
        sizePX - the length of the two strokes making the crosshair
        color - the color of the crosshair
